description: Get a private endpoint trusted owner entry for a cluster

parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`cockroach_cloud_get_private_endpoint_trusted_owner`]

cluster_id.description: cluster_id is the ID for the cluster.

owner_id.description: owner_id corresponds to the UUID of the private endpoint trusted owner entry.

parameters.title: CockroachCloudGetPrivateEndpointTrustedOwnerParams

title: cockroachdb_cockroach_cloud_get_private_endpoint_trusted_owner
